item.title: My Doom Emacs Configuaration
item.description: Figure 1: Emacs main window in iTerm2 Figure 2: Emacs quickshow window with Org agenda Intro Forewords A few words about my background. I’m a researcher in the field of social science. I don’t program much, but Emacs is essential for both my work and leisure projects. I’m using Emacs for interacting with R environment, composing long format texts, and managing my schedule as well as logging everyday life.
